title: How is the checking of Jammu University? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Checking Scheme of Jammu University is right and up to the standard But there are some myth's Quantity matters and Quality does't matterYou will not get full marksChecker will not read your answer properlyKnow, How to score good marks in Jammu University Exams or any other written theoretical exam? There are some effective point's if you follow will help you to increase your marks in exam , the points are÷ Try to answer your question with real examplesAnswer you question by making flow charts of main points and than explain itPresentation matters so try to write your answer neatly and clearlyGo for the point to point answer instead of paragraph answerNumber each question ,differentiate each question by making a line with pencil and at the end make double lineFollow these point and you will definitely get good marks THANK YOU!

Worst checking ever. I have done B. E. in Electronics and Communications from this university in GCET jammu. They just eat my 2 years because there is no supply system in this university. Professor and staff is worst. Just they have made money making machine out of this university. 1:No supply system means if u fail a exam the exam will be conducted after 1 Yr. Do hell with the system. No words. Completely frustrated.
